paper.title: Stepwise Refinements of Transitions and Places

author.org: University of Illinois At Chicago Circle
University of Illinois At Chicago Circle

paper.venue: Selected Papers from the First and the Second European Workshop on Application and Theory of Petri Nets
paper.abstract: It is known [1] that Petri nets can model a system hierarchically, i. e., a transition or a place of a Petri net representing a system at an abstract level can be refined to model the system in more detail, and conversely, a portion of a Petri net may be replaced by a transition or by a place to give a more abstract description of the system.
